backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing authorization, blob storage, user profiles, and conversation/message data with admin/user permission checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by adding an empty conversations map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
Checklist outlining prerequisites, steps, verification, rollback, and troubleshooting for promoting a preview build to production.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining OKLCH-based color variables, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the root element and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing splash screen, authentication flow, navigation between landing and chats, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component providing navigation, authentication handling, and user menu with conditional options based on login state.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Vibechat logo image with fallback text if loading fails, supporting multiple size presets.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Modal dialog for capturing photos using the device camera with error handling, switching cameras, and returning a captured file.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a conversation view with header info, participant avatar, message timeline, and composer, loading participant data dynamically.
Shows the user's conversations, handles loading and errors, and renders selectable conversation rows with participant info.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Handles composing and sending messages with text and media attachments, including file validation and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Fetches and renders message history with media support, indicates sender identity, and auto-scrolls to latest messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewConversa: Dialog for creating a new conversation by validating a Principal ID and invoking the create conversation mutation.
frontend/src/components/ContactsSyncDial: Dialog for syncing contacts via the Contacts Picker API or manual entry, matching them to Vibechat users and starting chats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Lets users choose or capture a profile photo, validates image files, and previews the selection.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen with fade-out timing before calling a dismissal callback.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi-step authentication flow including phone entry, verification, and profile setup with optional photo upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, phone availability, and password management using the actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Implements the chat UI layout with conversation list, detail view, and newâ€‘conversation handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and navigation actions for auth, contacts, and chats.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Validates image files and reads them into Uint8Array for profile image uploads.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumbers.ts: Utilities for normalizing and extracting phone numbers from text or contacts and checking API support.
frontend/src/utils/readFileAsBytesAny.ts: Validates and reads image or video files into Uint8Array for message attachments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theme extensions, typography, container queries, animations, and custom color variables.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's overall state, versioning, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the Vibechat app.
